name: The Pursuing Realm
description:
The Pursuing Realm

The Pursuing Realm is an endless side-scrolling runner game, where you find yourself in a cursed dark world.
You play as one of the last remaining Guardians of Light, while a massive fog of dark pursues you with an intimidating voice.

Other Info:

This game was initially made to be some sort of quick variation from another project I was working on, but after I got some positive feedback on it I decided to proceed with it.

Feel free to leave me any feedback, hope you like it! :)
